title: God Staff Jax Skin Giveaway for Split 1 Grand FInal
body: Has anyone received their God Staf Jax Skin, just curious if I will actually receive mine because I'm not sure if I followed the steps right or if I just need to wait.

replies.body: so you need to wait till the end of the week of the split that's when you will get your god jax skin

> [{quoted}](name=Asurine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QcdHErm7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-03T09:00:12.882+0000)
>
> so you need to wait till the end of the week of the split that's when you will get your god jax skin

Asurine could i ask when the end of the week of the split is?

It appears the last match of the split was played on the 31st, so you should expect to receive the skin sometime this week basically. 

If you haven't received it by the 11th I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
